name: aztecDISCOvery
description:
Bullethell your way through an ever changing Temple.

AztecDISCOvery is a simple game created for GMTK Game Jam 2021. Dodge your way through the ever changing rooms of the temple to get the treasure. Or that would be the concept, but the color based room modifiers that can be chained together for increased score kinda didn't make it into the game. We overplanned a bit. Oh well... It's still fun so have fun playing!
